attributes.action: Get Boris Johnson to acknowledge and condemn china’s vile treatment of Muslims
attributes.additional_details: The treatment is inhumane, they are being put in these camps purely because they are Muslim and it’s vile and needs condemning
attributes.background: Get Johnson to make steps towards putting great importance on this issue , try and stop the abhorrent treatment of Muslims purely based on their religion.

rejection.details:
You may wish to look at this petition calling for a similar:

Impose sanctions on China over its treatment of Uyghur Muslims 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300146
